page.title: 01Bromsgrove Town
page.content: Bromsgrove is an average size town with a population of just over{43,600} people.The High St is now a paved shopping area and looks very nice.There are a lot of shops in Bromsgrove,some people go to Redditch.People work at the main factories like Garringtons,Bayers and B.W.G.Many go to work at British Leyland in Longbridge or elsewhere in Birmingham or Redditch.Bromsgrove has its own running track and swimming pool.Bromsgrove is less busy than Redditch.Bromsgrove has changed a lot over the years.A few years ago a by pass was opened.Recently the M5 has been closed and there have been a lot of traffic jams.This has made the by pass very hard to cross.A lot of people live in Bromsgrove but work elsewhere.
